welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming City of Paranaque, known for its vibrant culture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal exclusively used by Philippine Airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small terminal dedicated to budget airlines for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.
